title: e-Task-Based Project Learning for Developing 21st-Century Scientific Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic scientific concepts and problem-solving experience in work environments
context.additional_context: A customized program for workplace learners to strengthen practical competencies in science, requiring a design executable in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Twelve collaborative tasks utilizing digital tools (smartphone apps) to solve real-world scientific problems.
Improvement of the ability to analyze information and propose creative solutions in open-ended scientific problem situations.
Demonstration of concrete evidence of 21st-century competencies (critical thinking, effective communication, etc.) through project deliverables.
Formation of an online network with diverse experts and integration into the problem-solving process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
